text: The Lamborghini V10 is a 90 degree V10 petrol engine. It was first made by Lamborghini for the Lamborghini Gallardo in 2003. It was the first engine made by them since they were bought by Audi. ==Vehicles== As of 2019, these are the vehicles that use the Lamborghini V10: Lamborghini * Gallardo LP 550-2 * Gallardo LP 550-2 Spyder * Gallardo LP 560-4 * Gallardo LP 560-4 Spyder * Gallardo LP 570-4 Superleggera Edizione Technica * Gallardo LP 570-4 Spyder Performante Edizone Technica * Gallardo LP 570-4 Squadra Corse * Gallardo LP 550-2 Bicolore * Gallardo LP 550-2 Tricolore * Gallardo LP 570-4 Super Trofeo Stradale * Gallardo GT3-R * Gallardo LP 600 GT3 * Sesto Elemento * Egoista * Huracán LP 610-4 Avio * Huracán LP 580-2 * Huracán LP 580-2 Spyder * Huracán LP 610-4 Spyder * Huracán LP 610-4 * Huracán LP 620-2 Super Trofeo * Huracán GT3 * Huracán Super Trofeo Evo * Huracán LP 640-4 Performante * Huracán LP 640-4 Performante Spyder * Huracán LP 640-4 Evo * Asterion LPI 910-4 Audi *R8 V10 *S8 D3 *S6 C6 *RS 6 C6 ==References== Category:Lamborghini engines
title: Lamborghini V10
